src:
GRAFIKA: Bogat sportski program u novembru
Treba iskoristiti i maksimalno uživati

03 Nov 2019

Sportski novembar počeo je uz poraze Pari Sen Žermena i Barselone, remi madridskog Reala, preokrete Liverpula i Mančester Sitija, potpuno lude mečeve Juventusa sa Torinom i Intera s Bolonjom, Ajntrahtovo gaženje Bajerna, ubedljiv trijumf Partizana nad Vošom i sigurnu Zvezdinu pobedu nad Proleterom. Ali, uprkos svim nabrojanim stavkama, tek smo na početku pretposlednjeg meseca u godini i do kraja nas čeka još mnogo uzbudljivih sportskih događaja. 



Već u utorak ljubitelji Lige šampiona moći će da uživaju u sjajnim mečevima Lige šampiona, gde smo izdvojili duel Dortmunda i Intera, dok će navijači Partizana konačno moći ponovo da vide svoje idole uživo i podrže ih u meču šestog kola Evrokupa protiv Venecije. U sredu će fudbalska Srbija moći da isprati novi evropski test Crvene zvezde i revanš meč s Totenhemom na stadionu Rajko Mitić, dok će u četvrtak opet prštati na sve strane. Fudbaleri Partizana igraće s Junajtedom u Mančesteru svoj meč četvrtog kola Lige Evrope, dok će košarkaši Crvene zvezde u Štark Areni dočekati madridski Real!



Za subotu 9. novembar rezervisan je Klasiker i novi sudar Bajerna i Dortmunda, dok će se dan kasnije fudbalska planeta podeliti na crveno i plavo za sudar svetova i derbi Premijer lige između Liverpula i Mančester Sitija na Enfildu! Istog dana staro rivalstvo obnoviće Juventus i Milan, posle čega se ulazi u novu reprezentativnu pauzu.
Za sredu 13. novembar rezervisan je Partizanov okršaj s Tofašom u Evrokupu, da bi narednog dana fudbaleri Srbije dočekali Luksemburg u završnici kvalifikacija za EURO 2020.



Posle Reala u petak 15. novembra sledi dolazak Asvela, posle čega slede dva ozbiljna sportska događaja za kraj polovine meseca. Srbija će ugostiti Ukrajinu, a za isti dan rezervisan je prvi košarkaški večiti derbi u kojem će Partizan biti domaćin Crvenoj zvezdi! Pogledajte i kakav sportski raspored nas čeka do kraja meseca...






Kvote za sve ove utakmice moći ćete da pronađete na sajtu MOZZART Bet, a kompanija MOZZART potrudiće se kao i uvek da ponuda bude što kompletnija i bogatija.
text:
GRAPHICS: A rich sports program in November
It should be used and maximally enjoyed

03 Nov 2019

Sports November began with the defeats of Paris Saint-Germain and Barcelona, draws of Real Madrid, Liverpool and Manchester City reversals, completely crazy matches between Juventus with Turin and Inter Milan with Bologna, Eintracht's extinguishing Bayern, convincing Partizan triumph over Vosha and secure Proletina. But despite all these items, we are just at the beginning of the penultimate month of the year and there are many more exciting sporting events ahead of us.



Already on Tuesday, Champions League fans will be able to enjoy great Champions League matches, where we singled out a duel of Dortmund and Inter, while Partizan fans will finally be able to see their idols live again and support them in the sixth round of Eurocup against Venice. On Wednesday, football Serbia will be able to take on the new Red Star European Test and rematch Tottenham at Rajko Mitic Stadium, while on Thursday it will once again blow all over. Partizan footballers will play their fourth leg of the Europa League game with Manchester United in Manchester, while the Red Star basketball players at Stark Arena will welcome Madrid Real!



A classic and a new clash between Bayern and Dortmund are reserved for Saturday 9 November, while the day after that the footballing planet will split red and blue for the collision of the worlds and Premier League derby between Liverpool and Manchester City at Enfield! On the same day, the old rivalry will rebuild Juventus and Milan, after which they enter a new national team break.
Partizan's clash with Tofas in Eurocup is reserved for Wednesday 13 November, so that next day Serbian footballers will welcome Luxembourg in the EURO 2020 qualifiers.



After Real on Friday, November 15th comes the arrival of Aswell, followed by two serious sports events for the end of the half month. Serbia will host Ukraine, and the first basketball eternal derby in which Partizan will host Red Star is reserved for the same day! Check out the sports schedule by the end of the month ...






You can find the odds for all these matches on the MOZZART Bet website, and the MOZZART company will try as always to make the offer as complete and rich as possible.
